data.name: WaitDownloadingVideo
data.value: Please wait, the video is downloading...

data.name: WhatShouldIDoWithThis
data.value: What should I do with this?

data.name: HelpText
data.value: Working with TikTok links: Simply send me a link. Here's an example of how your message might look: tiktok_video_link Some cool text that will be sent along with the video to all your contacts, if you've added them in advance :D I recommend using hashtags for video navigation. It will be convenient for both the sender and the recipient :) Adding contacts: 1) You need someone who agrees to connect with you and might be subjected to spam attacks from videos. 2) You give them your (or take their) link in the format: 1234ab56-cde-78fg-01hi-2j34k56790 (You can find the link in the main menu under the "My Link" button). 3) Then you press the "Add Contact" button in the main menu. After that, you will be asked to specify the link of the person you want to add, in the format: 1234ab56-cde-78fg-01hi-2j34k56790 Just the link, nothing else needs to be written. If the link is invalid and no one is found, you will be notified and returned to the main menu. Also, if you suddenly decide not to bother the person with videos, you can press the "Back" button, and the process will be stopped. You will be returned to the main menu. 4) If someone is found, you will be notified, and you will only need to press a couple of buttons. 5) Information about the person will be shown, and you will be asked to confirm sending a request to them. This will be your last chance to reconsider and refuse to add the person to your contacts, so be careful. 6) The person will receive a notification about the request, and you will only need to wait until they add you in return. After that, your videos will be sent to your contacts (where you just added a new person). How to accept a contact request: 1) Press the "View incoming requests to add to my contacts" button. 2) Find the button with the name of the person you know and want to add to your contacts. 3) Press that button, and that's it. The person is added, for now, that's how it works :) Enjoy using it! The project is still very young, constantly improving and changing, so keep an eye on updates! Either manually or through the person who gave you the link to this amazing bot :D Links that should be supported can be found here

data.name: GroupHelpText
data.value: Simply send me the command: /link [tiktok_video_link] PS: square brackets are not needed :)

data.name: MuteUserInstructions
data.value: To mute a user (you will not receive videos from them), you need to specify either their ID or their link.

data.name: UnmuteUserInstructions
data.value: To unmute a user (you will start receiving videos from them again), you need to specify either their ID or their link.

data.name: MuteTimeInstructions
data.value:
To convert seconds to other units of time, use the following ratios:
1 minute = 60 seconds 1 hour = 60 minutes = 3600 seconds 1 day = 24 hours = 1440 minutes = 86400 seconds
Thus, for conversion:
To convert seconds to minutes, divide the number of seconds by 60. To convert seconds to hours, divide the number of seconds by 3600. To convert seconds to days, divide the number of seconds by 86400.
The last step and we will mute them. Now enter the mute time in seconds:

data.name: IndefinitelyButtonText

data.name: WhosTheGeniusText
data.value:
Hello everyone! I am ZenonEl, the creator of this bag of code and algorithms. My GitHub: https://github.com/ZenonEl/
The idea of creating this bot came to me when my acquaintances were again forced to send TikTok videos (which I don't use) manually (downloading them and sending... then deleting the video from the phone...). In general, I thought it would be great to simplify these monotonous actions for them and decided to create this bot. Now, thanks to it, I can run a simple bot even on my PC. Set a list of contacts from whom I want to receive videos, and that's it, I've made life easier for myself and my acquaintances. Convenient!
Enjoy using it!
PS: In the future, it is planned to make the bot a universal relay. Where through the config, you can set the supported sites and how the bot should work with them.
